game.name: Nitro Turtles
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Nitro Turtles is a racing game about super fast turtles! Reach insane speeds with awesome shell-attached gadgets, compete in crazy races with friends, and sprint across the finish line to claim ultimate turtle victory!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nitro Turtles is a racing game about super fast turtles! Reach insane speeds with awesome shell-attached gadgets, compete in crazy races with friends, and sprint across the finish line to claim ultimate turtle victory!
